title: For those of you do not know Akali:
body:
Akali:  Attack damage  58 – 113 
Mark of the Assassin: Initial Magic Damage: 35 / 55 / 75 / 95 / 115 (+40% AP)  6 / 5.5 / 5 / 4.5 / 4 second cooldown.

This means every 6 seconds, I can deal 35 damages.

replies.body:
They nerfed her R range.
They removed stat bonus from Twilight Shroud.
They nerfed her R recharge rate.
They nerfed her Q base and scaling damage.
They increased her re-stealth timer.
They changed Crescent Slash to no longer trigger mark.
They massively nerfed Gunblade.
Sweeping lense upgrade is as cheap as chips and basically every team has one mid-game which is her shining time.
Pink wards now take 5 hits to destroy rather than 3.
They massively nerfed Lich Bane.

Mark triggering now pulls minion aggro because you can't crescent slash, making it unworthwhile without shroud - hence her "harass combo" eliminates her escape mechanism and costs massive amounts of energy and her only other option is Q harass which deals a total of 0 damage.

Her sustain makes her good for top lane, but all these changes eliminated her usefulness and she's better as a mid laner to roam for ganks, objectives, team-fights etc but you have limited usefulness in the capability to dash 3 times as basically one dash and you are at their turret so she's literally a -1 on a 1-10 scale of usefulness.

Her total AP scaling is terrible, she gains more out of utility based builds like Zhonya's and Gunblade - even though she has decent base damages, flat spell pen items suck on her because building anything but mercs is usually out of the question and Haunting Guise doesn't upgrade into something that useful for her - they nerfed Rylai's, if Zhonya's is less necessary and she gets caught out she's basically GG'd. she can't even burst down carries when she's fed because her kit is so slow and other assassins have 5 times as much dive potential as her - with escapes and to top it all off - her early game now sucks so terribly that it's basically impossible to get any form of a lead over your opponents and even with a lead - her mid-late game is now so bad that it's literally pointless playing her.

I've had zero problems destroying top lane with her on countless occasions. When she first came out crescent slash didn't trigger her mark so it was kinda imprinted in me never to bother with it even when it was stupidly powerful. Between her kit and item changes she's taken some hits but she's still up there in terms of assassins, you just need to play her properly.
how is this better than Vlad q which is lvl 1 is 90 magic damage at 10 second cooldown where in 2 akali q's in 12 seconds you only do 70 damage? :P

Considering how Top Lane works, that is a ton of damage early game for free. The enemy champion would have to have at least 30 hp/5 (6hps) in order to nullify the spell cast, if not including MR. Also, Akali energy regeneration completely restores the energy cost with that cooldown timer.  Eventually, you could wear your opponent down with easy trades, forcing an early recall.

Did I mention that it does more damage if you autoattack them? 
Oh, and she HEALS from the spellvamp! 

With base stats, at level 1:
 
Akali will heal (35 × 0.06) 2.1 health from every cast, and if the mark is activated, she will heal (considering 58 AD) ((58) × (0.06) + 45) × (0.06) an additional 2.9 health.
That's 5 health every 6 seconds from spellvamp alone and a combination of (35 + 58 + 58 × 0.06 + 45) 141.5 magic and attack damage if every mark is activated.

All at level 1. Without runes. Base stats. No items.
